answers.answer: I am so sorry you lost her like this -so sick at the end. You did the kind thing, in not letting her suffer any more. It is possible she would have suffered just terribly if you had hung on and tried to treat her various health problems with medication. It might not have worked, and her life could have been a misery.So though you must feel devastated right now, and miss her terribly, she is at peace, and you were a good mom to her. Blessings.

question: My 7 year old chipin started vomiting and refusing food and drinking profuse amount of water.  Thne after 5 days several times she vomited black blood.  She was overweight.  Could it be complication of diabetes?I took her to human society - when I saw more black blood and total malaise, I ran to far away humane society.  They xrayed - no obstruction - blood test.  When I saw still vomiting I begged them to put her to sleep.  They very reluctantly did this and were emotional - the delayed blood tests came back indicating kidney, liver and heart problems.
title: what about a dog vomiting back blood and profuse urination after drinking water?
